text: Tum kabhi yeh na paogey ke jo log Allah aur aakhirat par iman rakhne waley hain woh un logon se muhabbat karte hon jinhon ne Allah aur uske rasool ki mukhalifat ki hai , khwa woh unke baap hoon, ya unke betay, ya unke bhai ya unke ehle khandaan. Yeh woh log hain jinke dilon mein Allah ne iman sabt (inscribe/written) kar diya hai aur apni taraf se ek rooh ata karke unko quwwat bakshi hai, Woh unko aisey jannaton mein daakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein behti hongi. Unmein woh hamesha rahenge. Allah un se razi (pleased) hua aur woh Allah se razi huey.Woh Allah ki party ke log hain. Khabardar raho, Allah ki party waley hi falaah paney waley hain
